H0.text: In the Bible, name the son of Saul who was a friend of David. Abner

H1.text: In the Bible, name the son of Saul who was a friend of David. Ish-bosheth

H2.text: In the Bible, name the son of Saul who was a friend of David. Mephibosheth

H3.text: In the Bible, name the son of Saul who was a friend of David. יהונתנ

A4.text: Jonathan is the eldest son of King Saul of the Kingdom of Israel, and a close friend of David.
